Package mars.riscv.hardware

Class Register

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • mars.riscv.hardware.Register
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Register.FPRegister

    public class Register
extends java.util.Observable
    Abstraction to represent a register of a RISCV Assembler. Integrated to RISCV architecture by Maya Peretz in September 2019.
    Version:
    September 2019
    Author:
    Jason Bumgarner, Jason Shrewsbury, Ben Sherman

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Register.FPRegister
      This subclass represents floating point register.

      Register​(java.lang.String n, int num, java.lang.Number val)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void changeResetValue​(java.lang.Number reset)
      Change the register's reset value; the value to which it will be set when resetValue() is called.

      • resetValue

        java.lang.Number resetValue

    • Constructor Detail

      • Register

        public Register​(java.lang.String n,
                int num,
                java.lang.Number val)
        Creates a new register with specified name, number, and value.
        Parameters:
        n - The name of the register.
        num - The number of the register.
        val - The initial (and reset) value of the register.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName​()
        Returns the name of the Register.
        Returns:
        name The name of the Register.

      • getValue

        public java.lang.Number getValue​()
        Returns the value of the Register. Observers are notified of the READ operation.
        Returns:
        value The value of the Register.

      • getValueNoNotify

        public java.lang.Number getValueNoNotify​()
        Returns the value of the Register. Observers are not notified. Added for release 3.8.
        Returns:
        value The value of the Register.

      • getResetValue

        public java.lang.Number getResetValue​()
        Returns the reset value of the Register.
        Returns:
        The reset (initial) value of the Register.

      • getNumber

        public int getNumber​()
        Returns the number of the Register.
        Returns:
        number The number of the Register.

      • setValue

        public java.lang.Number setValue​(java.lang.Number val)
        Sets the value of the register to the val passed to it. Observers are notified of the WRITE operation.
        Parameters:
        val - Value to set the Register to.
        Returns:
        previous value of register

      • resetValue

        public void resetValue​()
        Resets the value of the register to the value it was constructed with. Observers are not notified.

      • changeResetValue

        public void changeResetValue​(java.lang.Number reset)
        Change the register's reset value; the value to which it will be set when resetValue() is called.
